article.title: Bladder_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: WiktionarybladderBladderoften refers to the urinary bladder, which collects urine for excretion in animals.
article.heading: Biology

list.listitem: Urinary bladderUrinary bladder (Chinese medicine)Bladder control; seeUrinary incontinenceArtificial urinary bladder, in humansPig bladder, urinary bladder of a domestic pig, with many human uses
Gallbladder, which stores bile for digestion
Swim bladder, in bony fishes, an internal organ that helps to control buoyancy

article.heading: Technology

list.listitem: Waterskin, a traditional container for transporting water
Hydration system, sometimes known as a bladder
Pneumatic bladder, an old technology with many industrial applications

article.heading: Geography

list.listitem: Bladder Lake, a lake in Minnesota
